display_name: Generalized Anxiety Disorder-7 Questionnaire: Total Score
description:
Calculated - Summary score based on a 7-item questionnaires for generalized anxiety. Scale 0 - 3 for individual items; 0 - 21 for overall score. Scores of 0-5 are categorized as mild anxiety, 6-10 as moderate anxiety, 11-15 as moderately severe anxiety, 15-21 as severe anxiety, respectively. As a screening tool, score of 10 and above suggests further evalution. [Schwartz, Jandorf & Krupp, 1993 (PubMed ID: 8229906)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/8229906/)

[Search for all Fatigue Severity Scale variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/stages/variables?search=fss)
